name: Relax Simulator
description:
Just stop and relax. Forget about all the fuss and feel the magic of music in this game.
Four different modes:
1. Logic arcade in style "3 in row"
2. Classical puzzle game, where you need assembly the image from pieces,
3. Arcade in "bubble shooter" style, where you need to shoot at groups of gems with the same color.
4. Memory game.

Features:
5 different scenes
4 game modes
26 images for puzzle mode + support of custom images
12 music tracks with different mood
Randomization of ambient and decorations
